document.docAuthor: Dathe, Holger H. & Proshchalykin, Maxim Yu.
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Hylaeus Fabricius in Mongolia, an updated species inventory (Hymenoptera: Apoidea, Colletidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Hylaeus Fabricius in Mongolia, an updated species inventory (Hymenoptera: Apoidea, Colletidae)

Distribution in Mongolia .
*Bayan-Ulgii Aimag, Uvs Aimag, Khovd Aimag, Govi-Altai Aimag, *Arkhangai Aimag, Bayan-Khongor Aimag, *Bulgan Aimag, *Uvurkhangai Aimag, *Umnugovi Aimag, *Tuv Aimag, *Dornogovi Aimag (
Fig. 3
b).
General distribution. China (Xinjiang), Russia (Asian part), Kazakhstan , Mongolia , Tadzhikistan , Afghanistan , Turkey .
